title: BANNED???
body: I do not deserve to be banned!!! remove it!!

replies.body: Your argument is sound. Riot, please unban this poor, harried soul!
To quote the hungry beaver: bring out the logs!
Yeah this is definitely going to work!

I was falsely banned. After my two chat restrictions, I reformed for 9 months. And I got full honor. Suddenly one game, I say bad a couple of times, noob also, because a feeding alistar in ranked was spam pinging me and saying way worse things. So it was supposed to go back to chat restriction cause I reformed, but it went to temp....??? Then eventually I got a perma. I never say anything worse than trash, and I rarely say that. just noob and bad sometimes. I don't know how saying bad and noob a couple of times skips my reform?? it was an error to ban me because I wasn't reported for 9 months and reform is a thing but I guess its bugged. I lost my level 210 account that I spent two years on and hundreds of dollars to an error in reform. Each time I go to riot support, they say that it "wasn't an error" but they don't even explain why. And it wasn't an error anyways sooo
can you please post the reform card and the other material?

> [{quoted}](name=   ŠängGrê,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bv4m4Juk,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-06-22T03:06:49.790+0000)
>
> I do not deserve to be banned!!! remove it!!

I asked you over on boards feedback if the ban was a forum ban or an in-game ban. Seeing as it looks to be an in-game ban, you may want to consider filing a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and asking them about your ban status.

Thanks,

Galacius
